title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 3
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hmm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>What’s up, Kasumi-chan? You look down<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No, it’s nothing. Kasumin was just wondering why nothing has been working out even though Kasumin’s luck is supposed to be the best right now….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hey everyone, we’ve all placed our orders, so you’re free to go to the drink area. I’ll look after our belongings<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yaay! What should Rin get? Ruby-chan, have you decided yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby is always confused when it comes to choosing stuff like this. Are you the type that decides right away, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>For Rin it’s~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Just leave it to Kasumin, you two! Eli-senpai and Karin-senpai too, please leave your drinks up to Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You usually get confused because you want to drink everything in the drink area, right? But don’t worry! This Kasumin will mix various things and create an original drink! It’ll taste really really good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kasumi-chan, is this one of your pranks again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I-, it’s not~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’ll take you up on that, I guess? An original drink sounds interesting<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eli-senpai~♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin would love something fizzy nya! Rin is leaving it to you, Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You can count on Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Here you go~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What color is this….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rather than fizzy it’s like bubbling nya….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It seems like there is a lot of thick stuff too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I don’t think even Honoka can make something like this….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Go ahead, it’s Kasumin’s proud creation~! Kufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>….*Gulp*. Huuh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hnn…. Ah, the taste is mild….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>There’s no way…. My, it really is. It’s an odd flavor, but I like it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>There are drinks like these too, huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No way!!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
